scripts.start:main: yarn copy &&yarn overrite  && cross-env NODE_ENV=development  webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.main.dev.js && webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.preload.dev.js && electron --inspect=5858 ./dist/electron.js
scripts.build:main: yarn copy &&  cross-env NODE_ENV=production  webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.main.pro.js && cross-env ENV=production  webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.preload.pro.js
scripts.build: yarn build:main && yarn build:render && yarn build:hover
scripts.packageWin32: yarn clean && yarn overrite  && yarn build && electron-builder --win --ia32 --config ./builder/builder-config-win32.js
scripts.packageWin64: yarn clean  && yarn overrite && yarn build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config ./builder/builder-config-win64.js
scripts.packageDarwin: yarn clean && yarn overrite  && yarn build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config ./builder/builder-config-mac.js
scripts.pack:win32: tron-client memorize && yarn clean && yarn overrite  && yarn build && electron-builder --win --ia32 --config ./builder/builder-config-win32.js
scripts.pack:win64: tron-client memorize && yarn clean  && yarn overrite && yarn build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config ./builder/builder-config-win64.js
scripts.pack:mac: tron-client memorize && yarn clean && yarn overrite  && yarn build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config ./builder/builder-config-mac.js
scripts.pre-commit: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint
